thumb.title: もう一度あなたに会える現実に逃げ込む / IcyLapis ft. はかいね舞子 (UTAU)
thumb.description: Production Notes & Fun Facts: This song was made on April 21, 2025. This song is a tweet to my mistress who has disappeared or perhaps passed away. This song is strongly influenced by the famous book Uy, which is my main inspiration as a Vocalo producer. Tools and software used: Hakaine MaikoCapCutIbispaintXAudiotool Studio(Sorry, my Japanese is not very good.) It's not my native language. )
